calculatorName: Clinical Pulmonary Infection Score (CPIS) for VAP

cases.description: Score 0 - low likelihood of VAP, all parameters normal
cases.source: Schurink CAM, et al. Intensive Care Med. 2004. All 0 = Low likelihood.

cases.description: Score 3 - low likelihood, mild temperature elevation and moderate secretions
cases.source: Schurink CAM, et al. Temp 38.5-38.9 (+1) + Moderate secretions (+1) + Diffuse infiltrate (+1) = 3.

cases.description: Score 5 - borderline low, multiple mild abnormalities
cases.source: Schurink CAM, et al. Temp (+1) + WBC abnormal (+1) + Moderate secretions (+1) + Diffuse infiltrate (+1) + Moderate culture (+1) = 5.

cases.description: Score 8 - high likelihood of VAP, significant abnormalities
cases.source: Schurink CAM, et al. Temp >=39 (+2) + WBC abnormal (+1) + Purulent secretions (+2) + Localized infiltrate (+2) + Moderate culture (+1) = 8.

cases.description: Maximum score 12 - all parameters maximally abnormal
cases.source: Schurink CAM, et al. All maxed: 2+2+2+2+2+2 = 12.
